comments: So I am really disappointed with this app. I should have read the reviews first. I just tried it for the first time. The main reason I wanted this app was for the recording feature. I set it to automatically record my conversations and when I ended my call I went back to replay my recording to see how it sounded. Well there is absolutely no sound at all. An hour and 20 min conversation of dead silence. I can't even find any options to fix this. Will be uninstalling asap.

Don't even waste your time with this one. You can't hear the person on the other end line. You might just as well talk to yourself. Blocked calls? Pfffff.....they still get thru. The blocking don't work at all. If someone calls the conversation isn't even recorded. The blocking method has nothing.to do with it. FIX IT SO IT WILL RECORD! THIS APP SUCKS BUG TIME!

Great application as it has a great database of users but has one very serious and anoying bug. It freezes the phone once try to identify caller and it keeps popup screen frozen for 30 sec to 1 minute after receiving the call. Sometimes freezing does not allow to answer the call and it remains frozen for sometime. Too sad as this started after last upgrade.

Has everything you need in a call app/call blocker/caller ID, call recorder.though it does let some useless unsolicited telemarketer's calls through sometimes. It Work's well once you figure out all the services it performs.But the circled 'yes' choice isn't showing on their questionaire so you can't answer in the affirmative saying YES if that is your choice of answer but you can answer " NOT SURE" if you want which is weird and you'll be tempted to cause can't use YES 😱

I have had a bad experience with this App. Since I have installed it on my phone I am no longer able to answer calls. They do come through but it is not showing anywhere or even giving me an option to answer call, I can only see the caller once they have hanged up and that's on my recent calls.

title: Textra SMS
description:
Want a beautiful, super fast and highly customizable alternative to your stock Android messaging app?

Well today is your day. Textra is simply outstanding!

Comes with a bunch of great features, notably 180+ material design theme, bubble & app icon colors. Dark, light & auto-night modes, multiple bubble styles, scheduled (future) SMS & MMS, stop during send, slide to delete, slide to call, quick snap camera, multi-select picture gallery, quick reply SMS popup, awesome MMS GROUP messaging, quick voice memos, GIFs, 21 text sizes, message blocker / blacklisting, pin-to-top, automatic video & picture compression, plus heaps more!

Customize your preferred theme & bubble colors, signatures and notifications (icon shape, LED color, sound, vibration, privacy, reminders and muting) PER CONTACT as well.

Get all the latest (2900+) Android, Twitter, Emoji One & iOS style emojis including diversity (skin tone). Just pick your preferred emoji style and express yourself!

NEW: Copy Partial Text inside a bubble, tap a bubble to check out this great new feature!

It's pretty special; try it, tell your friends, shout from the treetops, but most of all enjoy it.

Fully compatible with Pushbullet, MightyText, Android Wear and Android Auto (car) for enhanced notifications and quick reply.

All Textra features are free forever. Occasionally you'll see an ad, or you can choose to make a once only in-app purchase to remove ads forever.

Support, Knowledge Base & Feedback @ https://textra.uservoice.com

Simple. Beautiful. Fast.

comments: I love this app and have been using the free version for several years. The customer support is the most amazing part of the app. They really care about how their app is running, respond lightening fast to questions and give easy to understand instructions on how to fix issues, which in my case have been problems with my phone not updating correctly. Keep up the good work Textra!

I was really enjoying this app but l started receiving messages all through the night last night, which is highly unusual for me. Upon contacting the senders to see why they were texting me all night, I found out that those messages were sent during the day and evening, but I never received them until after 2am! Why are my messages being delayed?? People probably thought I was ignoring their messages.

Textra is, and probably always will be my favorite alternative SMS app; it's clean, customizavle and almost identicly to stock Messaging apps. The only reason I'm doing four stars across almost every app I use, is the fact that the only new feature with paying for premium is ad removal. I get you have to make your money, but it would be nice to pay even an extra dollar for some more features! Otherwise, this is an amazing app!

This app is top notch. I have a Google pixel 3 and you really can't customize the messaging app the comes stock with the phone. So I figured I'd try this app and this app has many customization features. You can change the way the icon is colored, specific icons for specific contacts, custom word bubble shapes, different fonts, a huge GIF library and many more awesome features. If you want an extremely customizable SMS app, this is the one. I'd give it 6 stars if I could.

I love this app so much. The messages send right away, practically EVERYTHING you can customize, and it's just great all together. Hell, you can even change the color of the freaking app icon! This app is exactly what I was looking for. I have one issue though, whenever I send a video or gif or song or whatever, it takes a few minutes to send it, I don't know if my phone is just a little crappy or if it's a issue with the app itself, but still, Textra is great with that issue or not! :D

title: Hobnob Invitations: Invitation Maker & Text RSVP
description:
Whether you are celebrating a birthday party, planning a wedding, counting down the days until graduation, or even getting prepared for a baby shower, Hobnob is THE perfect invitation maker to create stunning online invitations. 

START WITH THE INVITATION MAKER

- Create stunning online invitations in seconds with our invitation maker. 
- Choose from an array of amazing invitation designs that are perfect for birthday parties, happy hours, graduation and more!
- Feeling creative? You can also upload your own custom design.

INSTANT RSVPS AND REMINDERS

- After using the invitation maker, hit send and immediately start seeing RSVP responses from your guests! 
- Invites will be sent to your guests via text message or email. To RSVP they can simply reply to the text with YES or NO. No downloads required!
- Automatic RSVP reminders ensure your guests RSVP!
- And a day before the event, guests will get a reminder that includes a link and directions.

THE FEATURES DON’T STOP THERE

- Easily chat with all your guests in the event chat or send a direct message.
- Add links to any invite! Create online invitations with links to wedding and baby shower gift registries, ticketing, shopping, and more!!!

SEE ALL THE PHOTOS

- We automatically ask your guests to share photos, so you see all of the pictures not just a few on social media
- Your guests will see when you made your birthday party wish, received your graduation diploma, when the best man made a wedding toast, or even pictures of the games you had at your baby shower!

GATHER YOUR GROUPS

- Keep the chat going! With just one tap, turn any guest list into a group chat.
- Groups help you organize your closest friends, family, and most importantly, the people you enjoy spending time with in real life.
- Easily send online invitations to the whole group for a future birthday party, a graduation, a baby shower, wedding events and more!

Hobnob is THE invitation maker you’ve been looking for! Do stuff in real life with Hobnob.


Plans:
HOBNOB STANDARD:
- Up to 50 Invites per Month
- Invite Hobnob Users for Free
- Custom Flyers
- Event Chat & Photo Sharing
- Share on Social Media
- Co-hosting

- Premium Flyers
- Send Instant Event Updates
$3.99 monthly, $23.49 annually

HOBNOB PREMIUM:

- All of the PREMIUM features
$47.99 monthly, $284.99 annually

Privacy Policy: https://hobnob.io/privacy

comments: Excellent Event Planning App The app makes events and gatherings easy to manage when inviting guests. Love that I can upload my own design, add a link for gift registry or anything, has a box to share instructions or details with guests, capability to group or individually chat with guests or share photos, guest can easily get directions directly from the apps navigation system, and finally I love that the app automatically sends event reminders to RSVP and the day of the event.

Pretty invitations but the problem is... When the host makes an update or post a message only those with the app receive it. So how then are you supposed to make plans with your friends and family? And, further, I am paying for this and can't get a message to my people...wack!

I always use hobnob to make birthday invites! Easy to use. I can make invites look however I want and can go back and edit if I've noticed a mistake. I LOVE how invites include an option for wish lists so it's easy for people to see what the birthday girl/boy want instead of having to guess. Great app!!!

Can't view or post pictures from android. Feature parity with IOS is terrible, and at times it's been like a completely different app between the two systems. Also no way to indicate a time zone for virtual events.

Need to be on two devices to get and enter verification codes entered if using a phone. Probably going to delete this app, shouldn't be this hard to reply to an invite, seems like we are forced to add the app just to reply

title: 10-21 Police Phone
description:
Free 10-21 app users can:
- Call citizens from local numbers
- Receive and respond to callback requests
- Direct citizens to dispatch for immediate assistance

10-21 Police Phone Premium subscribers can:
- Set your outbound caller ID to "LAW ENFORCEMENT"
- View the citizen's caller ID in callback requests
- Send an automatic follow up message via SMS
- Retain call records for the life of your subscription

10-21 (radio code for "make a phone call") is a Police App for making free* calls to citizens that GET ANSWERED. Calls are made from local (not blocked) numbers without revealing your personal number. Stop getting sent to voicemail!

For example, if you call a citizen in Miami area code (305), they will receive an incoming call from a local (305) number, regardless of where you are. They are more likely to answer that call on your first try.

If the citizen calls back, rather than bugging you off-duty, they will be prompted to "Press 1 to Request a Call Back" (via Push Notification) or "Press 0 to Reach a Dispatcher" (connects to a non-emergency number that you provide).

When citizens request a call back, you receive a Push Notification on your phone rather than a phone call. At your convenience, simply tap the notification to initiate a call back out to the citizen.

*Calls are made over a VoIP data connection and do not use your cellular minutes. While the data used is minimal, data usage fees from your provider may apply.

Terms of Use: https://app.10-21.com/terms/phone

comments: This app is amazing. It was introduced to me by my captain and has a real use for me in my department. I'm constantly out in the field needing to contact my complainants and this helps me manage that. My only complaint was the amount of time it takes for the representatives to respond when you begin. However they updated the app and I think it had something to do with the increase in speed on that.
It was decent when it was free to use. Now that this cost money the short comings are completely unacceptable.
You can't delete history calls. If you pocket dial, this could be bad. Bring back the delete history. Case privacy at risk.
Awesome application however it does not support bluetooth use. I find myself not using 10-21 more that using it because of this issue. Is there anyway we can have the bluetooth feature added?

Forgot my password, sent recovery email multiple times; never recieved link. Clicked the help button, sent me to a strange google link with no informatiom about anything. Uninstalled, reinstalled....nothing works.

title: Telos Free Phone Number & Unlimited Calls and Text
description:
★ Pick a FREE U.S. Phone number in any area code
★ Enjoy unlimited calling and texting plans
★ Save a lot on international calls and texts
★ Add a 2nd, 3rd, or even a 4th line for your phone or tablet
★ Smart phone numbers help you manage your life and work
★ No contract, no commitment, no need to change SIM cards or switch phone companies to enjoy Telos phone service

☞ Free Phone Numbers
- Choose a FREE U.S. phone number with any area code you like
- You can also choose vanity numbers which may not be available from AT&T or Verizon
- Unlimited Call and Text plans available for calls & texts to regular phones
- Enjoy free calls & texts via WiFi or cellular data - no more phone bills
- Receive incoming calls & texts from anyone, in any country
- Perfect for traveling overseas. Your friends and family in the U.S. can reach you without long distance

☞ Real Mobile Phone Numbers
A Telos phone number is a real mobile phone number so it can do exactly the same things as a cell phone number from your phone company
✓ It can receive calls and texts from any person
✓ You can use the new phone number as the contact number for your bank accounts, utilities and websites 
✓ It can even be ported out to your phone company if you like
✓ Set up voicemail and auto reply messages
✓ Block unwanted calls & messages
✓ Set up call forwarding to any landline and mobile

With a Telos phone number, you can add a 2nd line or 3rd line for your Phone/Tablet without extra SIM cards.

☞ Worldwide Phone Numbers
Telos provides international phone numbers for many countries:
.	United States
.	United Kingdom
.	Canada
.	Spain
.	Netherlands
.	Sweden
.	Belgium
.	…
Get a local phone number to enjoy local service when you’re traveling abroad. Stop paying outrageous roaming charges just to communicate with local friends, Uber drivers, hotels, and restaurant

☞ Save On International Calling & Texting
- Make cheap - even free - international calls to any mobile or landline phone number in over 200 countries
- Low cost international calling plans are available to countries such as India, Bangladesh, Pakistan, China, Nepal, Nigeria…
- Send international texts to any mobile device worldwide at super low rates
- Your friends don’t need to have the Telos app to receive your texts

☞ Turning Your Android Phone Or Tablet Into A Burner Phone! 
* Get a disposable number to help you stay private and anonymous
* “Burn” the number with just a click so you no longer receive calls and texts
* Burned numbers will immediately go out of service and will be deleted from your phone. You can then get one, two, three, or more new phone numbers with the same features
* Use a Telos phone number in any situation where you need a temporary or anonymous number and burn it instantly when you’re through

☞ Smart Phone Numbers Help You Manager Your Life and Work
- Get a Telos phone number to stay connected when your phone is out of service
- Use a temporary phone number as your personal number for safe dating or Airbnbs
- Buy or sell on Craigslist with complete anonymity
- Create a second line to manage your work & life

☞ Clear Voice—No Cell Minutes Needed

free unlimited calls and texts are only free when the person that is calling you or the person you're calling has Telos app or service. Even if you're connected to Wi-Fi it's still charges you 3 credits per minute. Maybe good for paid service but as far as free service other apps are better.

Keeps coming up with "network error" message.

title: Call Assistant: Call Screening, Dialer, Hold Music
description:
Call Assistant App UPGRADES your PHONE with an incoming call experience for your business incoming calls and personal incoming calls for when you're busy, need more time to answer or don't know who the caller is. Your new dialer features an incoming call screen that can place callers on hold music from Spotify (for premium Spotify subscribers), screen calls, and have your call assistant take your calls when you simply can’t. 

Adding the call assistant to your phone takes less than 30 seconds and will help make your business more professional.

Key Features:

•Default Dialer - The core functionality of our app relies on being the default dialer so we can handle all of your call logs in one central location, process outgoing calls, block calls and more. 

•Call Screening - Find out in real time which calls are business/important and never have to speak to a robo/spam caller again. Call Screening is as easy as pressing a button. 

•On Hold Music - When you just need more time to answer the phone Call Assistant will place incoming calls on hold music. While they wait you can finish what you were doing and then take the call.

•Automatic Spam/Robo Call Blocker - Call Assistant will help filter out spam calls automatically in addition you can use Call screener to block robo calls.

•Reply by Audio - Call Assistant will take your calls for you when you are busy. 

•Visual Voicemail - Read your voicemails as them come in with Text to Speech

•Off network missed call log - Call assistant will tell you who calls when your phone is off network or phone battery dies. 

•Call back reminders - You will get a reminder to call back all of your missed calls 

•And much more!!!

With billions of phone calls made each day just in the US alone we are focused on making mobile phone call assistant technology for Android that is simply aligned with our everyday lives on the smartphone. Call Assistant wants to help people with their digital well being and create an experience that people LOVE every-time the phone rings. 

Call Assistant allows you to screen calls by pressing the call screener button. Your assistant can find out who’s calling and what the call is about. You never know...that call could be a really important business call with some money attached to it. With over 50% of calls been spam, Call screening is a must!

Give yourself more time to answer an incoming call by simply pressing the hold on music button. Call Assistant will place callers on hold music to a selection of preloaded music and Spotify music (for premium Spotify subscribers)

You no longer have to be afraid of being busy. Call Assistant will tell your business incoming calls, family, and friends why you can’t pick up the phone. And with Call call back reminders call assistant will even remind you to call them back! 

Call screening will make it so you never have to talk to a spam or robo call ever again.

The first of its kind call screening service for all of those unknown numbers 

Call screening is great with a heavy volume of business calls 

When you are with other people or in a quiet place Call screening is very discrete.

Call Assistant in app concierge will available to answer any questions you may have, provide feedback and feature requests. 

Request new features and improvements in app with our new chat feature. 

Currently Available for:

AT&T 
Verizon 
Sprint 
T-Mobile

Many optimizations and bug fixes

UI improvements to the home screen

Upgraded search

comments: This app is what the native phone app should be like. I just could not live without it! I especially love the call screener function...I can see in real time what the caller is calling about....and if they just hang up without talking, then I know it was a spam call. Love this app!

This app stops robocalls and solicitors instantly. And so much more. Today after painful dental appt. I took a nap, didn't even hear the phone ring next to me. But woke up to both calls transcribed better than a court reporter could do. I was so impressed I called the FCC, I just had to tell them after being on a do not call list for a decade that didn't work. This app managed to do every they have never achieved. Yes this is the GOLD STANDARD treat yourself to an app that is seamless.

Tjis is an AWESOME app. I initially had install issues...(my bad) uninstalled app, reset phone. And reinstalled. It is working great now. The functionality is awesome the phone screener allows you to interact with the caller without ever having to pick up the phone unless you want to. Voice messaging is awesome. Highly recommended app it's like having a personal secretary.

Wow this app is unbelievable. I have been waiting forever for this. Def worth buying. I now have a piece of mind everytime the phone rings. The app keeps getting better each and everyday. The developers are very responsive. If you have a feature request they get right to it.
Early Access to Everyday use, now $10.00 per month or $50.00 per year.......Yeah, No.......your overzealous, let me cash out yesterday, desire to put on my big boy pants doesn't 'play' here........

comments: App working well, just one problem I'm having whilst using youtube. I like to play music in the background while at work, after 20 mins the music pauses and I get a popup asking if i would like to continue watching. It's quite irritating as I don't want to be constantly having to go to my phone every 20 mins. Is there any way to remove this function?

Opening a new tab would show the 'activate advance mode now' and 'manage cards' while not showing my most frequent visited pages. That unbelievably frustrating. I get that you want to advertise for our but not showing it? Really? But you don't show that in incognito mode so I don't get the reason. Atleast it's good at blocking ads from video streaming sites.

I have been using this application for a long time. Initially it was good at blocking advertisements when watching videos on Youtube. Then, advertisements appear continuously and disturbing. I report directly from the application and write reviews. Then, the developer of this application hears user's complaints and makes improvements. My suggestion should be to check periodically so that it doesn't stop users from using this application.

I do not know whether this is a hidden function or not, but whenever I have an incognito tab open, and I quit the app halfway, and then reenter the app, the app will crash, and the tab I had opened earlier will be gone. It doesn't happen for normal tabs but only for incognito mode. Please fix this asap, it has been going on for months now.

I got tired of the massive amount of ads both on the main yahoo news page as well as within the articles themselves. So I downloaded and installed this, and, guess what? Yep! This isn't blocking any ads at all. Uninstalling it within minutes of this review. It's a complete waste of time and memory.

title: Complete solution browser
description:
We provide the privacy essentials you need to seamlessly take control of your personal information as you search and browse the web, no matter where the Internet takes you:
• Escape Advertising Tracker Networks — Our Privacy Protection will block all the hidden third-party trackers we can find, exposing the major advertising networks tracking you over time, so that you can track who's trying to track you.
• Increase Encryption Protection — We force sites to use an encrypted connection where available, protecting your data from prying eyes, like Internet Service Providers.
• Search Privately — You share your most personal information with your search engine, like your financial, medical, and political questions. What you search for is your own business, which is why DuckDuckGo search doesn't track you. Ever.
• Decode Privacy Policies — We’ve partnered with Terms of Service Didn't Read to include their scores and labels of website terms of service and privacy policies, where available.

title: Anonymous Texting
description:
Anonymous Texting gives you a second real phone number that you can use to keep your personal phone number private.

Keeping your personal phone number private increases your privacy and security. Most likely, you are using your personal phone number to login to several different accounts, including your bank account. In order to maintain high security, while still having the freedom to give out your phone number, you should use Anonymous Texting's second phone number. Anonymous Texting is ideal for situations where you need to give out your phone number, but don't want the other party to be able to snoop on your life. Give your anonymous phone number to grocery stores loyalty award programs, potential employers, online dating sites, and any other situation that makes you feel uncomfortable.

★★ FEATURES ★★

✓ Incoming messages are free
✓ Supports sending and receiving images
✓ Earn free credits
✓ Unique and real phone numbers from authorized telephone carriers

★★ TOP LEVEL SUPPORT ★★

If you ever find yourself in need of assistance, use our live support chat in the app! Or email us anytime at support@anonymoustextapp.com We are here to make sure you enjoy the most out of our products.

By using this app you agree to our terms of service, which include to not mislead others.

We listen to our users and love to get feedback from you! If there is anything you want us to add or make better, just contact us and we will use your input in our decision making.

comments: Awesome. It's good if you need to text someone and keep your phone number private. In my job, I have to communicate with people constantly and in this technology age, people prefer to text rather than talk on the phone. It is easier to text somebody Veron to call and leave a voice message because People seem to respond to text messages a lot quicker.

This app used to be awesome...I still have the original installed and as long as you have credits it works...but it wont let you buy credits. The credit also used to be a helluva lot cheaper. Tried to get a new phone number because it says it expires every two weeks...but it said it would charge me 10 credits...How are you going to make a number expire every two weeks but charge 10 credits to get one? And charge a dollar for 2 credits that it wont let you buy???

I purchased ten credits and attempted to send a text. I keep getting a message saying that my number is no longer available. When I try to purchase a new number, it just keeps spinning. So the app has charged my PayPal account, yet it will not let me use the service. Reporting to PayPal.
I keep getting error serve not responding, please try again later. And it's been 3 days and still doing the same thing. Fix the issue and let me know
I referred someone and didn't get my credits! I also think that it's bs too credit a text. Why not credit themes or something? Also I took a survey and no credit was added!

The best rated alternative to your default Android SMS & MMS App
 Simple, smooth and effective
You can customize almost everything and you have access to awesome features like the typing indicator and real timer caller id.

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I want to love this app, but it just keeps breaking down. I thought moving to a new S10 would solve it...and for a while it was fine. Now I have notifications from phone calls that won't clear, and it otherwise continues to cause more pain than pleasure. From the other reviews here, does not appear you fare any better with the paid version. It's a shame as conceptually it's the best app out there but execution is everything.

In the hope of the app developer reading this, this is more of an error report than a review. I can't seem to contact you either through FB, Twitter or the app's "Assistance" so I'm trying here. Today I got a notification from the mood app saying "This call - Private number". I have no clue what it means and I can't remove it from my notification area, without disabling all notifications from the app. While trying to report it in the app I received another with a smiley. Why am I getting this?

I used to love this app. Have been using it since 2018. But Mood has recently gone downhill because of all the advertising. I was okay with the new ad banner at the top of the app, but I just found out they've been advertising their app at the end of all my recent text messages without telling me! I've been sending text messages to customers, and they've been getting these ads in my messages! Very embarrassing! App has been deleted and don't recommend it to anyone!

Updated my review. The previous issue of my texts not sending on delay has been resolved. Thank you I always loved this app. Had everything I wanted in a messaging app UNTIL the latest update. I agree with all the other recent reviews. I can't send texts unless I have a 0 second delay set. I'm going to find another messaging app to use, until you fix this issue. I will change my rating if this issue gets resolved

I've used Mood for years but I finally need to stop. It has issues sending messages often as well as processing incoming MMS. It often marks old conversations as unread. This app doesn't work with Google assistant reading your texts if you have this app set as your default SMS app. So no hands free reading (although it can still send texts). Also doesn't forward the SMS to cars (tested on BMW and Jeep infotainment). So no need notification that you have a new message. Hope it improves one day.

title: Find My Friends, Family, Kids - Location Tracker
description:
iSharing Location Tracker app by iSharingSoft lets your family be in touch and stay connected with your friends anytime.

Family phone tracker provides a realtime location tracking service allowing families and close friends to privately share their location information and communicate with each other. Our gps tracker helps parents and caregivers reduce anxiety around the whereabouts of their loved ones with easy tracking and alerting messages.

With iSharing GPS Tracker you can:
• View the realtime location of Family members and close friends on a private family map that’s only visible on Family Locator
• Receive realtime alerts when a friend or kids arrive at or leave destinations - Best way to protect your kids and keep your kids safe!
• Receive automatic notifications when a friend is nearby - Find my Friends! (Eliminate disruptive Where are you? texts)
• GPS Location tracker for stolen phones or lost phones
• Shake your phone to send the Panic Alert in an emergency situation.
• Turn your phone or tablet into a walkie talkie with iSharing and enjoy FREE voice messages
• See the history of your loved ones' whereabouts

GPS Phone Tracker of parents and kids: For time-sensitive communication, GPS locator can quickly pinpoint the location of every family member. iSharing is a location sharing platform for peace of mind.

The best family locator App for loved ones: This handy, easy-to-use app leverages the latest technology to help you stay connected in realtime to the people (and the devices) that matter most. Parents can easily find their kids anytime.

iSharing GPS tracker app uses GPS coordinates and state-of-the-art GPS location data to report the realtime whereabouts of your friends and family. Simply install the iSharing locator app on your phone and your families’ phones. Once registered, each friends appears as a unique icon on the GPS tracking navigational map so you’ll know exactly where each family members is, at all times. No need to send annoying Where are your? or What’s your ETA? texts, the iSharing app puts this information at your fingertips. And to make life super easy, we send you realtime GPS alerts the moment your friends or kids arrive at the appointed location!

iSharing is a realtime mobile phone tracking system. the family locator app can pinpoint the location of registered mobile devices, and smart phones. in addition to this we lets you locate Android Phones, iPhones and iPad. Its easy to use. All you have to do is invite your family members or friends and you can start tracking them on your Phone to track any smart phone.

title: PrivacyStar: Stop scam with SCAM LIKELY protection
description:
PrivacyStar is a full-featured call protection solution for your smartphone from industry leader, First Orion. First Orion and PrivacyStar have been prominently featured by trusted news outlets such as: 
CBS
TIME
Forbes
Bloomberg
Engadget
PC Magazine
TechCrunch
"PrivacyStar won’t just tell you who it is, but also identify the caller indicating how likely they are to be an annoying telemarketer." -- TechCrunch
"PrivacyStar uses larger databases of untrustworthy numbers to preemptively block calls from the outside." -- The Verge

Features

•	Block any caller  
•	Stop Scams
•	Reverse Number Search
•	Block by Call Category
•	Report fraudulent calls to FTC
•	Protects your Privacy

Description of Features
BLOCK CALLS –You decide which numbers or callers to block, both individually or by category. You can quickly add any phone number to your personal block list.
STOP SCAMS – PrivacyStar automatically stops all known scammers, spammers, and stops fraudulent callers from bothering you. The database is updated every six minutes to ensure that your app receives the most accurate information available.
REVERSE NUMBER SEARCH – Unlimited reverse number lookups enable you to check any number, at any time. PrivacyStar will return a result displaying both the owner of the number and why that number may be calling.
PROTECTS PRIVACY–  We take privacy seriously. Your contacts are YOUR contacts! Unlike other apps, PrivacyStar never shares or sells your personal contact list. Your contact list is only used by the app to aid and enhance your experience with incoming calls on your device.  
BLOCK CATEGORIES – Tired of telemarketing and survey calls? PrivacyStar enables you to block entire call categories automatically! Block scammers, nuisance calls and more!
REPORT CALLERS – File complaints against abusive or aggressive callers directly from the app. These complaints are sent directly to the FTC to stop nuisance callers from bothering you. PrivacyStar, powered by First Orion, is the leader in FTC nuisance call reporting.
IDENTIFY CALLS – PrivacyStar will identify both the WHO and the WHY of any call! Enhanced call log and call detail information provides you with all available call detail, putting you in control! Real-time CallerID displays the caller name and any available additional category information.
FREE FOR 30 DAYS– Try PrivacyStar for 30 days and receive both BASIC and ENHANCED features. After the trial period ends, you may continue to use the app for free with the BASIC features which will block scams and allow you to report abusive callers. An annual subscription to PrivacyStar includes both the BASIC as well as all of the ENHANCED features. 

BASIC PROTECTION (FREE)
Always available for free to protect you from the worst types of callers: 
•	Automatic detection & blocking of known scam numbers 
•	Unlimited reporting of abusive callers to FTC

ENHANCED PROTECTION
Receive these additional features with your annual subscription to PrivacyStar:
•	Unlimited call blocking
•	Customized blocking by caller category
•	Real-Time CallerID
•	Reverse number lookup
•	Real-time call interaction with PrivacyStar’s Call Center
Interact with us on:
Twitter - https://twitter.com/privacystar/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/firstorioncorp/
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/privacystar/
* Due to changes in the Android system, text blocking is not available on Android version 4.4 and higher.
**Real time Caller ID requires a network connection.
Note: Premium pricing and feature sets may vary slightly by carrier.

description:
Sync.ME is the world’s #1 caller ID and spam blocker app. See whos call you received and sync contacts photos with their social network profile picture.

Identify spammers and block robocalls with the world’s best reverse phone lookup and spam blocker app.

★ Trusted by more than 20 million users worldwide!
★ TechCrunch - “The App That Turns You into a God”.

Main Key Features:

✓ Sync Contacts Photos – See who's call you received and sync your contacts photos with their social network profile picture. Add full screen photos to your contacts in your address book contact list.

✓ Caller ID – See who's the caller when you receive incoming calls. See the true caller ID, sync unknown Caller ID.

✓ Call Blocker - Block callers, telemarketers and block robocalls. Block unknown calls with our best call blocker. Block spam calls and add spammers to your blacklist.

✓Block Spammers - Block callers and make your own blacklist of robocalls, spammers and telemarketers. Make a reverse phone lookup with the best caller ID app. See whos call on the top spammers list and add them to your blacklist.

✓Call Recorder – Record any phone call you want to save.   

✓ Text ID – Identify SMS and text messages of spam, telemarketers and unknown caller ID. See the true Caller ID and blacklist phone numbers. You can make a reverse phone number lookup for any spam text message.

✓ Find Out Who Called - Copy any phone number and Sync.ME will make a reverse phone lookup so you can search phone numbers and identify unknown calls with a true caller ID. Received a spam call? Quickly block spammers, block telemarketers and block robocalls with just one tap.

✓ Caller ID Themes - Choose your color call theme for your caller ID with the Sync.ME color call app. View color call themes with full screen photos of your address book contacts from Google+,Twitter, LinkedIn and VK.

✓ Merge Contacts - Find duplicate contacts and merge contacts in your address book by combining them into one. Cleanup your address book and quickly merge contact details of duplicate contacts in your address book contact list.

title: Zoiper IAX SIP VOIP Softphone
description:
Zoiper is a FREE IAX and SIP softphone application for voip calls over 3G or WiFi. There are NO ADVERTISEMENTS.

For support please visit: http://community.zoiper.com

Zoiper softphone offers a simple user interface and superb audio quality for smooth Voice over IP experience.

Contact us for whitelabel versions with your logo and company or for our VoiP SDK if you want to build your own solution or visit http://www.zoiper.com/en/voip-sdk

Available for both SIP and IAX systems, Zoiper is a phone solution perfectly fit for end users, service providers, call centers or any business willing to benefit from VoIP communications.

Want to distribute it to your users ? Use the free automatic provisioning system on http://oem.zoiper.com and avoid tedious manual configurations!.

IMPORTANT: Zoiper softphone is a standalone client-side software VOIP phone application and is not bundled together with a voip service. To make and receive voip calls using Zoiper, you must subscribe to any SIP or IAX based service provider across the globe.

Zoiper's key features include:

- Support for different color schemes
- Bluetooth support
- Lowest battery usage with highest reliability / stability on google play
- Lowest latency of all android softphones
- Excellent audio quality, even on older devices
- Supports calling over 3G and WIFI
- Multiprotocol with SIP and IAX support, compatible with all RFC
compliant PBXs
- Background / multitasking support
- Integration with the native android contact list
- Speakerphone mute and hold
- UDP and TCP transports (use TCP for better battery life!)
- Supports g711 (ulaw, alaw), speex, iLBC and gsm codecs
- Supports sending of DTMF
- DNS SRV
- Built-in echo cancellation
- STUN support
- Change ringtone per account
- Call waiting
- Video support (gold users only)
- ZRTP / TLS support (gold users only)
- Call Transfer (gold users only)
- Wideband audio (gold users only)

Zoiper is also available as customized branding solutions or VoIP SDK, please contact us for more information.

- Phones that are unstable because they have broken audio implementations:
Alcatel one touch series (poor audio drivers cause system freezes and crashes)
HTC one m8 (causes freezes.)

WARNING: using Zoiper as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.

WARNING: Please use only versions from the appstore, we have reasons to believe some of the (russian) .apk files floating on the web contain a trojan that might steal username and password and make fraudulent calls. The official zoiper from google play is safe to use.

comments: I'm having an issue where the first 15 - 20 seconds of a call are very quiet, and the volume then slowly increases until I can be heard properly. Thanks for the reply - unfortunately I don't think it's the microphone as I'm not having an issue with the volume when making phone calls through other applications. Would it be possible to implement a feature that remembers the calibration of the microphone? Unfortunately if not I may need to use a different app as clients are struggling to hear me

Functionality is good. I like the app. But the Device Push Token (400) error keeps coming back. You boot the phone and 95% certain the app is no longer logging in. How often do they need to solve this issue? Note8. I stop the app, clean its cache. And sure enough, now it starts. "Account ready". The allowing-it-to-sleep option was a showstopper. Disallow it, et voila! So that solved a biggie. But booting the phone flummoxxing the app, and keeping a now invalidated token, come on!

I am failing to register my account. I contacted my service provider who provided me with the registration details but still I am unable to register. I am sure it's a bug of some sort, can you fix it?

Whenever a call ends or the caller hangs the call before I can answer, Zoiper opens the music player (whatever it's set as default: Spotify, Rocket Player, VLC, ...) and begins to play the music. Contacted the support months ago, no fix yet. Edit: now it's 3 months since their answer in which they said "should be released in 1-2 weeks", no fix so far. Almost 1 year has passed since the first time I signaled this. Edit2: signaled the bug again to the support for the 3rd time, got no answer

It's not worked with two connections from the same provider with PUSH enabled. Started normally, but after period of standby, one of connections stop receive incoming calls until manual restart. I'v switched from Bria because their version of PUSH is not a proxy but only a mobile client wake upper but Zoiper not worked too. It's a great pity.

title: Flyp - Multiple Phone Numbers
description:
Get up to 5 additional phone numbers on your phone — try it free for the first 7 days.

Flyp puts you in control:

☎️ Add up to 5 additional US phone numbers to your existing phone for only $7.99 each / month (1st number is free for first 7 days)
🗺️ Choose any area code you want for each number so that you’ll always have a local number
📵 Choose who can call you and when (Set “Do Not Disturb” for individual phone numbers)
💬 Call and text from any Flyp phone number in 15+ countries 
Flyp makes your life easier:

• Get unlimited calls, texts, and picture messages for each phone number
• Manage all your calls, texts, and voicemails from a single app
• Avoid having to purchase a second phone

Download Flyp to start your free 7-day trial.


GET MULTIPLE PHONE NUMBERS FOR YOUR BUSINESS

Instantly get up to 5 additional phone numbers for your business, all . Choose your area code and customize your own voicemail greeting — it’s the best way to keep your work and personal life separate (yet organized) on one device.

UNLIMITED CALLS, TEXTS, AND PICTURE MESSAGING

Flyp now lets you send and receive unlimited calls, texts, photos, and GIFs to and from any US phone number and to any international Flyp phone number.

comments: To whom it may concern, I've recently (3 day's ago) bought a new subscription and I was just informed that I've exceeded my number of minutes for the month. How can this be possible? This is becoming to be very expensive and costly for me. My cycle isn't up until March 25th of 2020, I'm paying for a service that I'm not able to use, can someone please explain?

I have been paying monthly for about a year now and my issues began when I tried to update credit card information. They have no ability to update credit card information in their app and you have to add another line then try and cancel. They were not able to so successfully and after 3 attempts I now am being charged monthly on 4 lines. Any time you try to communicate with them they have no live humans in service. No phone number, no chat nothing. Submit a request & you get auto EMAILS! 0☆

I've been using Flyp for business and it had been working pretty well overall. It gets tricky when a call comes through because it will disappear after the first ring and if you have a screen lock in your phone some calls get lost completely. The app doesn't allow you to renew your subscription and once it cancels its over. There's no way to contact anyone. The app has a place to only email. Terms and conditions doesn't show anything so getting any assistance isn't easy if it's an issue

Horrible App! I bought a subscription and used the number to run my business. After spending tons to direct traffic to the Flyp number, all calls immediately stopped. I got in touch with Flyp support and they told me my number was no longer supported - when I asked for help cancelling my subscription, they ignored me! Do not make the same mistake as me

2 phone numbers. Neither are working at this time. Both numbers are prepaid by the year's subscription. Close to a couple hundred dollars gone. Now the app is not working. Took my money and didn't provide the service. Whether you pay monthly or yearly...you WILL be scammed and took for your money.

title: Contacts, Phone Dialer & Caller ID: drupe
description:
Want to see Caller ID, spam indications and block spammers, directly from your call screen? drupe is your app. Trusted by over 20 Million users worldwide.

drupe replaces the boring call screen with a fresh look, built and configured exactly for you!

Forget about traditional Phone Book apps! We bring your contacts & apps together to one place, accessible from all your screens. Wish to contact a friend? Dial or text anyone? record calls? Swipe the contact to the app & get in touch! Simple. 

drupe app supports: Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Português, Português (Brasil), Pусский, Türkçe, norsk, український, עברית , العربية, हिन्दी, 日本語, 한국어.

Dial, text, record calls or reach anyone on your contact list, using any app! 
★ Smart dialer - Cross app dialing made fast & easy
★ A built-in call recorder - NEW ACR! Record incoming or outgoing calls! 
★ A smart caller ID tracker & blocker to find out unknown numbers  - drupe ID identifier will help you with the search & the tracking of call spammers + with adding them to your blacklist: Show the details of telemarketers or unknown & private mobile numbers who called you. Stop the blindness- Know "who is calling me" at any given time, see the details of missed unknown calls. Uncover the names of people or businesses who call you, and avoid unwanted calls.   

★  Add animated GIFs to your outgoing calls!- Make animated calls based on the context of your calls.
★ Organize your address book / Phonebook - solve the duplicate Google contacts issues. No more phone book mess...
★ All from one place -Dialer, WhatsApp, SMS, walkie talkie, Facebook Messenger, Google Duo, Allo, telephone… are all in, and there are more.
★ Unified “recent” feed –Track your recent communication log - call log, SMS, Walkie -talkie audio messages, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger and more. Reverse lookup those unknown numbers in your call history
★ Contact based reminders – Set reminders, time or context related. 
★ Missed calls manager – Get back to your missed calls via call, SMS, whatsapp or else. Snooze for later or set reminders
★ An integrated call blocker – Trace, discover and block any caller or number whether unknown, spam, scams, robocalls or telemarketers, expose their name and details & immediately move on to blocking them! 
★ A built in call recorder – Record both sides of the voice conversation (caller and receiver), Choose if to record all calls, or turn on the call recorder only when needed. 
________
❄ A true cross app dialer with T9 & dual SIM 
❄ A Caller ID ( identification ) finder & anti-spam add on, to always identify the traces and identity of each true caller name behind unknown or private calls. Always know who's calling and control your callers!  
❄ Contact based reminders
❄ A built-in auto call recorder for incoming & outgoing calls in your cell (ACR)
❄ Missed calls manager - Answer missed calls or set reminders. + a caller-ID locator. 
❄ A unified recent communications log – calls, SMS, messaging and more 
❄ An automatic favorites view
❄ A semi-transparent trigger icon is always with you – activated with one swipe to access your dialer or contacts 
❄ Works Seamlessly with your native Android functions: Call, SMS, Calendar, Email & More. 
❄ Integrated with: WhatsApp, Facebook, Tango, Google Duo, Allo & many more
❄ Choose from a bunch of amazing free themes and customize your drupe and cell phone look
❄ Easy search - Reach all your contacts from the main screen. Search also through typing numbers in the dialer. 
❄ Customize your favorites and communication apps by preference 
❄ Get help with updating relevant contact info – smart search for your friends on Facebook and more

Follow us for updates and news:
Facebook - http://facebook.com/getdrupe/
Twitter - http://twitter.com/getdrupe

recentChanges:
• Dual SIM
Bug fix: Shouldn't ask What SIM to use on every call
• Issues with XIAOMI?
If you're using Android 10 and having new issues with drupe, go to: Android settings -> Apps -> drupe -> Other permissions -> Show on lock screen, and enable.
comments: So far this app has not disappointed me at all. It has everything that you are looking for. 5 Stars for sure! Won't be disappointed. The only issue I am having is my calls are saying they are being recorded but when I go to listen to them it's dead air, silent. The recording time length is they're just no sound. It could be me, IDK. Not enough to give it anything less than 5 stars. Thanks Drupe. If you have any ideas on my recording issue, please let me know.

It could be a great app only if you weren't trying so hard to reinvent everything. The design is to much, childish even. So many features no one uses, with such a design, makes me rather use a different, straightforward dialer. Try at least to make another, lite and minimalistic version of the app and see the reaction. My bets are it will be more popular. Who, for example, needs a calculator in a dialer, really. Because of these problems I only use it for caller identification.

I like the features and functionality that I get through this app. However, there is one feature which I absolutely don't want as it troubles me almost all the time. When we get or place a call then we get a hold/un-hold button on the top left of the screen. So when we are on the call that button invariably gets pressed through the ear/skin and the call goes on hold in the middle of the conversation. Very troublesome button location. Kindly fix it to get better review.

Records calls but when you play the recordings, you cannot hear the other person. You are loud on the recording of the call and the other person is not even a whisper with a volume booster app and volume at the max. They can not be used as any kind of management in customer satisfaction or as evidence since you can't hear the other person. Useless! Have not found an audio editor that can edit my records from drupe. They can edit ones from other sources of call recording but not these. 100% waste

When in initial set up, the 5th and final screen presents the dots, then moves them to the right of the screen. The problem is that it moves the dots so far too the right of my screen, that they leave the screen entirely leaving me with nothing visible top swipe to the left. I can't use the app without passing this screen. -Can I bypass set up, and just go directly into using the app?

title: Marco Polo - Stay In Touch
description:
Marco Polo combines the best of texting, social media and video chats - all in one private, easy to use app. 

IS IT SOCIAL MEDIA?
It’s different from typical social media apps because Marco Polo is real, trusted and built to be good for you. Unlike many apps, Marco Polo does not sell user data for advertising. Marco Polo isn't about likes or social comparisons. This is an app that parents actually want their family to use. 

SIMILAR TO VIDEO CALLS?
Marco Polo is vastly more practical. You never play phone tag and you don’t have to schedule blocks of time just to say hi. Marco Polo gives you tone, context and certainty that your message was heard.

CAN I TEXT MESSAGE?
Yes! Just like text messaging, you can communicate on your own time. Marco Polo is face-to-face, so you end up understanding each other better and feel much closer. And if you find yourself in a place where you can't use video, you can still send photos and texts on Marco Polo.

FULL LIFE, NOT FULL PHONE
With no limits on length, and video stored in the cloud, you have room for life. 

UNLIMITED POSSIBILITIES
You can talk to friends and family face-to-face even if they aren't iPhone users because Marco Polo works over WiFi anywhere in the world. No more time zone scheduling! 

PRIVATE
Marco Polo is designed to be for your closest friends and family. You can't search and find anyone without their mobile number. Marco Polo is also ad-free and we do not collect your data

MARCO POLO HAS THE FOLLOWING SUBSCRIPTION:

 Marco Polo - $9.99/Monthly $29.99/Annually

Terms of Use: http://www.getjoya.com/terms.html

summary: Marco Polo is a new way to stay in touch with the people who matter most to you.
recentChanges: Thanks for using Marco Polo! We update the app every week to provide a faster, more reliable experience. Turn on auto updates to make sure you always have the latest version.
comments: Looooove Marco Polo. Love the ease to use the software, whether you're techy or tech-averse. The only thing I would like would be different filters. I'm sure that makes things more complicated or more difficult, but I hardly use the current ones cause they're pretty basic (and kinda lame [sorry]). Other than that feature lacking, I would have given them a 5 star.

Love that I can connect with people I haven't seen in years!! I can watch the videos as they are talking to me or later. Really love that it reminds me if i have a message I haven't watched yet! Especially now its great for my kids to use to stay in touch with their cousins since traveling is a no go with covid-19.Haven't had any problems at all and been using it for 4 months now.

Actually love the concept, but it sent texts to people in my contacts, which I cant have happen. I have a lot of my customers and coworkers in there, so had to delete account. I get it's trying to spread its name, but I would have actually told people about it, if they didn't do that. Edit: The app developers worked with me to explain how to disable the contact permissions, but still be able to use the app. Thank you!

It is like having a fantastic conversation but on your own time. Even if your grandkids want to tell you something but you aren't available they can leave as long of a video conversation as they want and it is sent easily and quickly and can actually be watched and reacted to in REAL TIME! This simple app is a communication miracle !! So easy to use.. videos can be saved for later viewing or forwarded. LOVE IT!!!

60% of the time the record feature doesn't work, says something went wrong, so I send a problem report each time. I've uninstalled, reinstalled, updated my phone, the app, and still won't work when I try to record. I've taken these steps several times and have to restart my phone every time I want to send a message to someone. It's the most frustrating messaging app I've ever used.

title: Second Phone Number: private texting & calling app
description:
Naturally, you need a SIM card to make a call or send a text.  But how about when you need to talk and prefer not to share your real phone number? You can choose a custom phone number to make phone calls and send messages using the Second phone number app. 🔥

*Making Calls*

There is no need to buy an additional SIM card and swap it when you go abroad and want to chat with your family or friends. You can make a call in just a few taps. 👌

Save money by making international calls and texting from the 2nd line number at the cheapest rates to reach your relatives anywhere in the world. Communicate via this calling app at any place, any time! ✈

*Sending Texts and Voicemail*

International texting is easy in this texting app. You can send a text or MMS to your foreign host when you arrive on vacation, and you don’t speak Italian, for instance. 

*Why else use it?*

You can use the 2d phone number instead of your actual phone number in different situations like: 

💑 Chatting with your date, family, and friends
🎙 Exchange voicemails when you can’t call or text
💼 Calling and messaging for work (e.g., as a second work number)

*Features*

★ Get extra numbers for calls and private texting
★ Make calls and send texts to any phone numbers within 28 countries worldwide  
★ Send MMS (available for US and Canadian numbers)
★ Use Voicemail to forward calls (available for US numbers)
★ Send SMS and view text message history
★ Add a number with just a few taps and delete it if you don’t need it anymore

🌍 Phone numbers available in: the USA, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Greece, Ireland, Israel, Estonia, Japan, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Puerto Rico, Slovakia, South Africa, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom.🌍

We look forward to your valued feedback on Google Play!
comments: I like the overall simple layout, but it says to start free trial and get phone number, and I click that with no luck, it says try again and I click that and still nada. Tried numerous times with no luck. Gonna Uninstall now and go with something else.

Most of the time unable to add credits, after purchase I followed 2 days as each time there was error showing server issues. Later they compensate me with 3500 credits which also took 5 days to get due to server issues. There is another serious issue while talking bell is ringing non stop as call is not yet through and it's really disappointing! I have sent several emails, rather being truthful that they have technical issues, they replied to reinstall app and send them video etc. I'm disappointe

I cannot even get a single number since the first day I installed it and the 3rd day I accidentally purchased it as I forgot to do cancellation. Always showing sign, try again, try again and so on. This is a BAD app. Don't install or buy it, it's a regretful purchase.
Terrible. Not able to cancel subscription. Messaged several times. The text messages did not work!!!
A Win 0 issues I can absolutely recommend this app!! Awesomenes I never had to contact customer service bc it works flawlessly! AAA+

title: ZoiPer Pro - SIP Softphone
description:
Zoiper pro users can now enlist in the public beta: https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.zoiperpremium.android.app
Major changes:
- new gui
- multiple and custom color themes
- better bluetooth support
- reworked network change
- new notification system

***PLEASE NOTE: In-app purchases made from Zoiper Free will not sync with Zoiper  Premium and vice-versa. Zoiper Premium includes all advanced features found in Zoiper Gold. If you have previously purchased Zoiper Gold, you already have all the advanced features found in this version.***

ZoiPer is a IAX and SIP softphone application for voip calls over 3G or WiFi. There are NO ADVERTISEMENTS.

For support please visit: http://community.zoiper.com

ZoiPer softphone offers a simple user interface and superb audio quality for smooth Voice over IP experience.

Contact us for whitelabel versions with your logo and company or for our VoiP SDK if you want to build your own solution or visit http://www.zoiper.com/en/voip-sdk

Available for both SIP and IAX systems, ZoiPer is a phone solution perfectly fit for end users, service providers, call centers or any business willing to benefit from VoIP communications.

Want to distribute it to your users ? Use the free automatic provisioning system on http://oem.zoiper.com and avoid tedious manual configurations!.

IMPORTANT: ZoiPer softphone is a standalone client-side software VOIP phone application and is not bundled together with a voip service. To make and receive voip calls using ZoiPer, you must subscribe to any SIP or IAX based service provider across the globe.

ZoiPer's key features include:

- Bluetooth support (beta)
- Lowest battery usage with highest reliability / stability on google play
- Lowest latency of all android softphones
- Excellent audio quality, even on older devices
- Supports calling over 3G and WIFI
- Multiprotocol with SIP and IAX support, compatible with all RFC
compliant PBXs
- Background / multitasking support
- Integration with the native android contact list
- Speakerphone mute and hold
- UDP and TCP transports (use TCP for better battery life!)
- Supports g711 (ulaw, alaw), speex, iLBC and gsm codecs
- Supports sending of DTMF
- DNS SRV
- Built-in echo cancellation
- STUN support
- Change ringtone per account
- Call waiting
- Video support
- ZRTP / TLS support
- Call Transfer
- Wideband audio

Zoiper is also available as customized branding solutions or VoIP SDK, please contact us for more information.

- Phones that are unstable because they have broken audio implementations:
Alcatel one touch series (poor audio drivers cause system freezes and crashes)
HTC one m8 (causes freezes.)

WARNING: using ZoiPer as a default dialer may interfere with dialing 911 emergency services.

WARNING: Please use only versions from the appstore, we have reasons to believe some of the (russian) .apk files floating on the web contain a trojan that might steal username and password and make fraudulent calls. The official ZoiPer from google play is safe to use.

recentChanges:
v.2.13.10
Fix crash in account settings
Various SIP registration/re-registration improvements
comments: I would rate this app higher if it were more reliable but it frequently fails to stay connected and I have to tap the red x next to the account to disable it then tap again to enable it. This fixes it temporarily until the next time it has a DNS issue. I don't get a warning, but I do notice the x in the notification panel sometimes. Who knows how long I go without being reachable when the app should be able to try again on its own. The developers say that's what it does, but it falls short.

EDITED: Not sure what is wrong: when I call using a headset (I tested 2 wired and 2 Bluetooth on 2 different phones), the other parties invariably gets very choppy voice. Tested between my own phones - indeed, my voice cuts in and out. No idea which setting - tried echo cancellation, tried microphone boost, tried all codex. Everything is perfect without headsets. Any ideas?
Occasional drop out, but voice quality is great, works well. Very happy
Only voip app i trust. I run my sip server and get my calls here. Very reliable.
Nice. But sometimes loses connection when on WiFi network.

title: International Calling App - Yolla
description:
Make premium quality international phone calls at the best rates possible. Call any country in the world to landline and mobile. International calling has never been cheaper!

Сheap calls to Iran from $0.15, calls to Ethiopia from $0.19, Sudan from $0.15, India from $0.01, Nigeria from $0.09

WHY CHOOSE YOLLA?

· CHEAP CALLS 
Call abroad as cheap as possible. Yolla offers best prices on the market, starting from $0.004 per minute. Enjoy cheap international calls with no hidden fees and extra payments - you always see the final cost on the screen. No cancellation period - balance never expires.

· PREMIUM QUALITY CALLS
Yolla provides best quality of phone calls on the market. Enjoy clear sound and great connection with the best internet calling service available. Call to Nigeria, call to India, call to Afghanistan quality will be just perfect.

· YOLLA HELPS TO SAVE MONEY 
Our affordable rates will help you to save on international calling and spend money on what you need. Save up to 90% on calls abroad vs. traditional carriers. Be it landline or mobile number you want to call, we got you covered. Forget about high roaming fees and enjoy cheap international calls with Yola.

· STAY IN TOUCH WITH FAMILY
With Yolla you can make calls to your family and friends back home. Talk to family wherever you are. They don't even need to have Yola, internet and smartphone. You are just one phone call away from your loved ones.

· MAKE CALLS FOR FREE 
Invite friends to earn free calls. Your friend makes first payment, and you both get extra $3 absolutely for free.  

· KEEP YOUR NUMBER 
Yolla uses your real number, so family and friends always know it is you. 

· CALL ANY NUMBER 
Need to call abroad to the landline phone without internet? Yolla will help with that. Mobile number? No problem. No matter what country and what number you call,  we offer you the cheapest rates possible.
Our polular countries to call: India, Nigeria, Ehiopia, Kenya, USA, UK, Sudan and many more!

· SEND YOLLA TOP UPS TO ANYONE 
Have friends or family using Yolla? Great! Now you can recharge their accounts. Just purchase and send Yolla credits to your family and friends. They will enjoy free talktime with you or anyone else.


EASY TO USE:

1. Install Yolla and sign up with your phone number
2. Add credits to your account
3. Type a number you'd like to call or select a person from your contact list
4. Call 

EXTRA FEATURES
✓ Use your contact list
✓ Referral program to earn credits for free international calls
✓ One account & number for all devices
✓ Buy credits online via app or from our site
✓ Optional auto top-ups, so you never run out of credit
✓ 24/7 support always ready to help you with internet calling
✓ Transparent per-minute pricing
✓ Make a call via Wi-Fi to avoid costly roaming fees.
✓ Free call feature - calls between Yola users are free of charge

We'd love to hear your opinion:
Rate our calling app and let us know if you like it!

Get Yolla today and start talking more for less! Drop the doubt and start enjoying international calling abroad! All you need is the Internet connection – WiFi, 4G, LTE, or 3G. Your friends and partners will see no difference - but you will.

Any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at hi@yollacalls.com

title: Psiphon Pro - The Internet Freedom VPN
description:
Psiphon Pro gives you unprecedented access to your favourite news broadcast or social media platforms. By its nature, Psiphon Pro also protects you when accessing WiFi hotspots by creating a secure, private tunnel between you and the Internet. Psiphon Pro is the best VPN tool for accessing everything on the Internet.

Features:
• Global network featuring thousands of servers and diverse entry points, keeping you connected at all times
• No registration required, just download and connect for free
• Wider selection of protocols than a VPN, offering unparalleled access to everything on the Internet through our global Psiphon server network
• In-app usage stats
• Configuration options - make Psiphon your own VPN with customized proxy settings
• Choose which apps to exclude from the VPN tunnel
• Open-source, peer-reviewed and trustworthy. Find out more at https://bit.ly/psiphon-source, and read a full audit here - https://bit.ly/psiphon-audit

You can pay a subscription fee through Google Play to remove ads and enjoy a further optimized use of Psiphon Pro, the best VPN out there.

comments: I use this as a proxy to get around school wifi, works well enough but unintuitive to start for the first few tries. Lacks ability to see what country you're in (at least in non-premium mode(have no clue about premium mode)) other than that, works well, slows down a bit, but it's really not that bad and you can still watch1080p even without psicash.bit of buffering but :/ if you live with poor internet. You wont notice.

Absolute garbage! I also used Psiphon on different PCs, it may "hide" your IP but at the cost of your internet speed taking the hit to the point its nearly dial-up. Even their pay-for-speed "booster" option does absolutely nothing. Contacting them is pointless, they do not respond. Tried other VPNs and there's no comparison - the worst VPN service - ever. Now that I know what to expect, there's no incentive to buy any service from this company.

I request you to add Russian server and improve the stability of this app. Still this app is far better than others and you can trust on it. But please add Russian server.

title: Bria Mobile: VoIP Business Communication Softphone
description:
Android Softphone App for VoIP and SIP voice and video calls, instant messaging and more! Try it free for 14 days! Subscription not charged if cancelled within trial.

Bria Mobile is new and replaces the former Bria Android Smartphone Edition and Tablet Edition clients.   If you had previously purchased the old clients and want to reinstall them, you can find the instructions to do so here: https://support.counterpath.com/hc/en-us/articles/115004178833-Install-Bria-for-Android-Android-Tablet-from-App-Library

Stay connected wherever you go.  Start or join meetings with high definition, face-to-face video, high quality audio, and instant messaging - now with Bria Push Service for enhanced battery life. 

Bria Mobile is an award-winning softphone that increases your business productivity by streamlining business communication across mobile devices and teams.  Whether you are a small start-up or a global enterprise, take the power of this award-winning softphone with you – at work, at home or anywhere in-between to ensure you stay connected and more productive.  

Use the new Bria Mobile app to:
•	Message or call any person or group within your team for fluid business communication
•	Join team meetings easily using voice and video calling

Technical Features Highlights:
•	Thoughtfully innovated, with over 10 years of technology development, Bria Mobile is now available either monthly or on an annual basis, which includes ongoing updates, Bria Push Service (for enhanced battery life), high definition video calling, G.729 and other Wideband Codecs (previously paid add-ons). 
•	Highly secure, SIP-based softphone with exceptional voice quality
•	Pre-defined VoIP provider list available when adding new accounts
•	Multi-tasking support for background operation, such as fielding incoming calls while using other applications
•	HD Audio Codecs including G.722, Opus and SILK
•	Video in 720p HD when using H.264 or VP8 on supported devices
•	Supported accessories include headsets, headphone, as well as other BluetoothTM devices 
•	Available English, Chinese, French, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, German and Spanish
•	IPv4 and IPv6 support, including NAT64

For More information on Bria Mobile for Android features, please visit:
http://www.counterpath.com/android-sip-softphone/ 

IMPORTANT NOTE
Bria Mobile is a standalone softphone subscription and not a VoIP service.  A SIP server or subscription with a SIP-based VoIP provider is required to make calls. See https://www.counterpath.com/itsp-partner-program/?tab=itsp_certified_partners to see some of the many providers that support Bria Mobile. 

IMPORTANT VOIP OVER MOBILE/CELLULAR DATA NOTICE
Some mobile network operators may prohibit or restrict the use of VoIP functionality over their network and may also impose additional fees, or other charges in connection with VoIP. You agree to learn and abide by your cellular carrier's network restrictions. CounterPath Corporation will not be held liable for any charges, fees or liability imposed by your carrier for use of VoIP over Mobile/Cellular Data.

EMERGENCY CALLS
CounterPath's Bria mobile products provide handling designed to redirect emergency calls to the Native Cellular Dialer when possible on a best reasonable commercial efforts basis, however this functionality is also dependent on the operating system of the mobile phone which is outside of our control and subject to change at any time. As a result, the official position of CounterPath is that CounterPath’s Bria product is not intended, designed, or fit for placing, carrying or supporting Emergency Calls. CounterPath will not be liable for any costs or damages arising either directly or indirectly from the use of the software for Emergency Calls.

• Join team meetings easily using voice and video calling

Technical Features Highlights:
• Thoughtfully innovated, with over 10 years of technology development, Bria Mobile is now available either monthly or on an annual basis, which includes ongoing updates, Bria Push Service (for enhanced battery life), high definition video calling, G.729 and other Wideband Codecs (previously paid add-ons).
• Highly secure, SIP-based softphone with exceptional voice quality
• Pre-defined VoIP provider list available when adding new accounts
• Multi-tasking support for background operation, such as fielding incoming calls while using other applications
• HD Audio Codecs including G.722, Opus and SILK
• Video in 720p HD when using H.264 or VP8 on supported devices
• Supported accessories include headsets, headphone, as well as other BluetoothTM devices
• Available English, Chinese, French, Japanese, Portuguese, Russian, German and Spanish
• IPv4 and IPv6 support, including NAT64

For More information on Bria Mobile for Android features, please visit:
http://www.counterpath.com/android-sip-softphone/

IMPORTANT NOTE
Bria Mobile is a standalone softphone subscription and not a VoIP service. A SIP server or subscription with a SIP-based VoIP provider is required to make calls. See https://www.counterpath.com/itsp-partner-program/?tab=itsp_certified_partners to see some of the many providers that support Bria Mobile.

IMPORTANT VOIP OVER MOBILE/CELLULAR DATA NOTICE
Some mobile network operators may prohibit or restrict the use of VoIP functionality over their network and may also impose additional fees, or other charges in connection with VoIP. You agree to learn and abide by your cellular carrier's network restrictions. CounterPath Corporation will not be held liable for any charges, fees or liability imposed by your carrier for use of VoIP over Mobile/Cellular Data.

EMERGENCY CALLS
CounterPath's Bria mobile products provide handling designed to redirect emergency calls to the Native Cellular Dialer when possible on a best reasonable commercial efforts basis, however this functionality is also dependent on the operating system of the mobile phone which is outside of our control and subject to change at any time. As a result, the official position of CounterPath is that CounterPath’s Bria product is not intended, designed, or fit for placing, carrying or supporting Emergency Calls. CounterPath will not be liable for any costs or damages arising either directly or indirectly from the use of the software for Emergency Calls.

comments: I like the app so far...i will say that my card was compromised the next day after signing up for the free trial. Lucky for me itbis a prepaid card
Reliable, easy to setup and high quality calls.

Once the app is setup with a Telviva account, there is a 3 second delay with incoming calls between the hard phone and the app. Although there is a look customization option, there are no pre set themes. Do you know how long it takes and how tedious it is to change one aspect of the look at a time??? There's no dark mode!

The app does not work anymore. I have tried to submit a ticket on the website (mobile version) and I get "restricted access". When trying to create an account, similar problem. Something else this counterpath The app does not dial out and the few calls that go through, I cannot hear any voice coming through. I got the automatic message "could you hear the person on the other line if not we will try to fix it", I pressed it and didn't do anything. P.s. Ive updated and reinstalled. Any ideas?

This app have be giving me nightmare for over three days I paid for it. I have trying to register this app for three days to no success. The app keep on saying register and registered fail. Please administration can you people get this problem fixed so I can make use what I have paid for... thanks you.

title: DashCommand (OBD ELM App)
description:
Transform your Android device into a customizable display and monitoring system. DashCommand puts you in control - Monitor and data log engine and vehicle performance, fuel economy, and instantly read and clear troublesome check engine lights, all with the easy to use DashCommand app. 

This app also features a professional skidpad showing lateral and accel/braking Gs with min/max indicators, a race track that visually maps out your location, acceleration and braking as you drive laps around the track, an inclinometer that shows rolling angle and vehicle pitch for off-roading, and the ability to data log, record and playback log files showing OBD-II and acceleration data.

DashCommand is a SEMA Show 1st runner-up for best mobile electronics product and four-time SEMA Global Media Award winner!

DISCLAIMER: DashCommand requires a compatible third-party hardware interface, purchased separately, to communicate with the vehicle.

DashCommand supports all OBD-II and EOBD compliant vehicles sold worldwide. Please verify that your vehicle is OBD-II/EOBD compliant before purchasing! Not all OBD-II compliant vehicles will have support for all of these parameters.

Manufacturer-specific data is available for select vehicles, through In-App purchase.

OBD-II Hardware compatibility:
- Auto Meter DashLink
- PLX Kiwi 3 and Kiwi 4
- OBDLink MX+
- ELM compatible WiFi
- GoPoint BT1

Watch a video on DashCommand:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y12tbLmf_J0

For suggested hardware, see: http://palmerperformance.com/hardware
